Title: Zurich
Writer: Barbara Te Kock, Frederik Steiner (directorial adaption of screenplay)
Actors: Liv Lisa Fries, Lena Stolze, Sophie Rogall, Max Hegewald
Plot: Terminally ill, Lea surprises her family with her wish to die, consciously and controlled, on her own birthday. Her mother tries everything to prevent the plan. But things turn out differently. Tragic and dignified.
